relevant_findings.finding: General physical examination revealed no abnormalities.
relevant_findings.neurologic: Alert; reached for toys more often with right hand; able to follow simple commands; speech barely intelligible.
relevant_findings.ophthalmologic: Moderate limitation of elevation of eyelids; probable concentric reduction of visual fields; reduced visual acuity; retinal pallor; bilateral cherry-red spots; optic nerves normal; slow saccades and difficulty initiating saccades.
relevant_findings.deep_tendon_reflexes: +++ with bilateral Babinski signs and clonus at ankles.
relevant_findings.tremors: Evident when sitting upright, standing, or reaching for an object.
relevant_findings.gait: Wide-based, moderately ataxic, spastic gait with inability to stand or sit without falling.
